name: Green Slaugther
description:
An hacker spotted a big conspiracy, but he  is alone, so he can't do anything to save  the world.

He can't call neither the police nor the army, he needs an outsider. Somebody who knows how to fight and has nothing to lose.

Prepare your weapons and Kill dozens and dozens of monsters!

You’re the last hope to save the world from the reptilians! 

                                                                      

Take your gun and kill all those bad reptilians!

GAME SPEC:

In this classic arcade side-scrolling shooter there are no saves nor checkpoint.

When you end your lives is Game Over, so be careful!

GAME CONTROLS:

GAMEPAD:

Left/right D-pad: Move the Player left and right
Button A: Jump / Skip FMV
Down D-pad: crouch
Right Trigger: shoot
Right Bumper: Use the Tomhawk

Start: Pause Game

KEYBOARD:
Left/right Arrow: Move the Player Left and right
Up arrow: Jump
Down Arrow: Crouch
X : Shoot / Skip FMV
C : Use the Tomhawk
P: Pause Game

Features:

- Tons of aliens 
- Blood
- More Blood
- Gamepad compatible
- Two different endings
- 6 Boss
